recipe.title: Prosciutto with Persimmons
ingredients: 2 persimmons, halved, each half sliced crosswise
instructions: Divide prosciutto slices among 8 plates. Arrange persimmon slices decoratively atop prosciutto. (Can be prepared 4 hours ahead. Cover with plastic wrap and chill.) Drizzle with olive oil, sprinkle with freshly ground pepper, and serve.
